ca.uqac.lif.labpal

Class LinearAssistant

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uqac.lif.labpal.LabAssistant
      • ca.uqac.lif.labpal.LinearAssistant
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class LinearAssistant
extends LabAssistant
    Lab assistant that executes the experiments one by one, in the order they have been put in its queue.
    Author:
    Sylvain Hallé

        public LabAssistant stop()
        Description copied from class: LabAssistant

      • clear

        public LabAssistant clear()
        Description copied from class: LabAssistant
        Clears the experiment queue for this assistant. Note that this also has for effect of stopping the assistant in case it is running.
        Specified by:
        clear in class LabAssistant
        Returns:
        This assistant

      • getTimeEstimate

        public float getTimeEstimate()
        Description copied from class: LabAssistant
        Gives an estimate of the time it should take to complete all the experiments still in the queue. It is up to each assistant to decide how to compute this.
        Specified by:
        getTimeEstimate in class LabAssistant
        Returns:
        The estimated time, in seconds
